# MIGRATION_TRACKING.md

## Overview
This document tracks the progress of the migration from Java to Python. It includes detailed steps, checklists, progress indicators, and status tracking to ensure a smooth transition. Use this as a single source of truth for the migration process.

## Code Review Checklist
- [ ] Code adheres to Python style guide (PEP 8).  
- [ ] Proper exception handling implemented.  
- [ ] All tests pass with 100% coverage.  
- [ ] Code is modular and reusable.  
- [ ] Comments and documentation updated.
